00013 VLNVDisplayer::VLNVDisplayer(QWidget *parent, const VLNV& vlnv):
00014 QGroupBox(parent),
00015 vendor_(this), 
00016 library_(this),
00017 name_(this), 
00018 version_(this),
00019 layout_(0) {
00020 
00021         QLabel* vendor = new QLabel(tr("Vendor:"), this);
00022         QLabel* library = new QLabel(tr("Library:"), this);
00023         QLabel* name = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00024         QLabel* version = new QLabel(tr("Version:"), this);
00025 
00026         layout_ = new QGridLayout();
00027         layout_->addWidget(vendor, 0, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00028         layout_->addWidget(library, 1, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00029         layout_->addWidget(name, 2, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00030         layout_->addWidget(version, 3, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00031 
00032         layout_->addWidget(&vendor_, 0, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00033         layout_->addWidget(&library_, 1, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00034         layout_->addWidget(&name_, 2, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00035         layout_->addWidget(&version_, 3, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00036 
00037         setVLNV(vlnv);
00038 
00039         QHBoxLayout* topLayout = new QHBoxLayout(this);
00040         topLayout->addLayout(layout_);
00041         topLayout->addStretch();
00042 
00043         setFlat(true);
00044 }

00046 VLNVDisplayer::VLNVDisplayer( QWidget *parent, const VLNV* vlnv ):QGroupBox(parent),
00047 vendor_(this), library_(this), name_(this), version_(this) {
00048 
00049         QLabel* vendor = new QLabel(tr("Vendor:"), this);
00050         QLabel* library = new QLabel(tr("Library:"), this);
00051         QLabel* name = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00052         QLabel* version = new QLabel(tr("Version:"), this);
00053 
00054         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout();
00055         layout->addWidget(vendor, 0, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00056         layout->addWidget(library, 1, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00057         layout->addWidget(name, 2, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00058         layout->addWidget(version, 3, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00059 
00060         layout->addWidget(&vendor_, 0, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00061         layout->addWidget(&library_, 1, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00062         layout->addWidget(&name_, 2, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00063         layout->addWidget(&version_, 3, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00064 
00065         // if vlnv pointer is valid
00066         if (vlnv->isValid()) 
00067     {
00068                 setVLNV(*vlnv);
00069     }
00070     else
00071     {
00072         vendor_.setText("UNSET");
00073         library_.setText("UNSET");
00074         name_.setText("UNSET");
00075         version_.setText("UNSET");
00076     }
00077 
00078         setFlat(true);
00079 
00080     QHBoxLayout* topLayout = new QHBoxLayout(this);
00081     topLayout->addLayout(layout);
00082     topLayout->addStretch();
00083 
00084         // this widget can not be expanded
00085         setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Maximum, QSizePolicy::Maximum);
00086 }

00121 void VLNVDisplayer::setVLNV( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00122         vendor_.setText(vlnv.getVendor());
00123         library_.setText(vlnv.getLibrary());
00124         name_.setText(vlnv.getName());
00125         version_.setText(vlnv.getVersion());

00128 void VLNVDisplayer::setPath( const QString& path ) {
00129         
00130         QLabel* pathHeader = new QLabel(tr("Path:"), this);
00131         QLabel* pathLabel = new QLabel(path, this);
00132 
00133         layout_->addWidget(pathHeader, 4, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00134         layout_->addWidget(pathLabel, 4, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00135 }
